item.description:
Bridesmaids
2011R
125 minutes


Named her best friend's maid of honor, down-on-her-luck Annie's competition with a fellow bridesmaid, the wealthy and beautiful Helen, threatens to destroy the wedding. Meanwhile, a local cop takes a liking to Annie.

Cast:Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph, Rose Byrne, Chris O'Dowd, Melissa McCarthy, Wendi McLendon-Covey, Ellie Kemper, Jon Hamm, Jill Clayburgh, Kali HawkDirector:Paul FeigGenres:Comedy, Screwball, Blu-rayThis movie is:Goofy, Raunchy
 
ENNEAGRAM AT THE MOVIES
Vegetarian dinner provided from 7 to 8pm. Fine to show up anytime. It's helpful for me to know in advance if you are coming, particularly if you are eating, though if fine just to show up if you can't decide beforehand. You are welcome to bring additional items if you want. Movie starts at 8pm and generally ends approximately at 10:30pm. We stop the movie on occasion to talk about Enneagram types, subtypes and relationship dynamics.

The cost is $20-25 sliding scale. Please feel free to bring friends and I can help them learn the types if they don't know the Enneagram.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, having taught over 2000 Enneagram personality types workshops, as well as the Myers-Briggs and Astrology. He is an author of 2 books, a psychotherapist for individuals, couples and families and leads Personality Types Trainings for groups, organizations, churches, schools, colleges and yoga centers.herb@herbpearce.com                        781 648 3737            www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies & Dinner - Bridesmaids
